reviews.review: Люблю эту игру,хоть купил я её совсем не давно.Я её олд,и не когда не прошу эту игру,не смотря на лень Valve
uffff mamalon el juego que juegaso <3.
Sigue siendo mucho mejor que algunos juegos actuales.

Лучший шутер в номинациях:
11 "АААА МНЕ ОБЛЕВАЛИ ЛИЦО КУДА СТРЕЛЯЯЯТЬ" из 10
9 "ОН СХВАТИЛ МЕНЯ УБЕЙ ЕГОООО" из 10
10 "ДА ГДЕ ЭТИ ЧЕРТОВЫ ПАТРОНЫ" из 10
Jogo bem bacano que ja estava para comprar a 4 anos mas fiquei sem acesso a conta e finalmente consegui acesso e posso jogar um dos melhores jogos de zombies

Left 4 dead original
um jogo velho muito bom mas que hoje em dia está bem morto e esquecido por conta da sua sequencia

o jogo em si é muito bom, apesar de muitos n comprarem o game porque ja tem as campanhas no 2
mas se fosse jogar o primeiro left vai notar que tem muita diferença ao contrario do remake

mas hoje em dia recomendo somente comprar o jogo em uma promoção
por que se for jogar online vai achar poucas partidas

[h1] Campanha e modo Versus [/h1]
ambas os modos são bons, a campanha si eu n tenho nada a reclamar ah n ser se fosse o caso do online que é poquissima
e o modo versus é um tanto como quebrado e desequilibrado e por parte disso só existe comunidade espanhola no versus ou seja não encontrará nenhum Br se quer, fora isso são tóxicos e qualquer coisa é kick

O modo Survival n tenho nada a dizer 
apenas que não tem ninguém jogando e também é bem morno o modo
[h1] Conclusão [/h1]
Enfim vale a pena jogar?
sim, vale a pena se quer conhecer melhor o game e não só ignorá-lo por conta que tem tudo no left 2
tem muita diferença pro original e do remake
como as animações das arma que são tops, os ragdolls que são muito engraçados 
e uma ESSENCIAL e que a valve deixou de colocar no 2 é a animação de andar no jogo, onde você poder olha as perna do personagem [spoiler] COMO VCS N COLOCARAM ESSA MARAVILHA NO 2? [/spoiler]
enfim recomendo que jogue no singleplayer ou com seus amigos se for o caso para se divertir,  de resto o online ta totalmente morta
7/10 so pela animações e exclusividade das campanhas xD
記住一點 趕盡殺絕 絕不留後患
Me encanta el juego super divertido y mas con la actualizacion
26.11.2020 Сегодня мне позвонил Гейб Нюьэлл, сказал что Left 4 Dead 3 почти деделали)

İndirim zamanı 3.70 TL'ye alabildiğimiz ve 2008 Yılında Çıkan Oyuna 2020'de devasa bir güncelleme getiren Valve, büyük şirket. Oyuna gelecek olursak her Co-Op oyun gibi arkadaşlar ile oynaması daha eğlenceli olan bir oyun. 6 Farklı senaryo yani küçük hikaye var. Bu küçük hikayelerde bol bol ateş ederek ve malzeme toplayarak kayıt noktalarına ilerliyoruz ve son kısımda boss savaşı yaparak senaryoyu bitiriyoruz. Her senaryo farklı haritada geçiyor. Sırf bu kadar eskimiş ve  bu kadar ucuz olan bir oyuna bu kadar büyük bir güncelleme getirildiği için bile indirimde alıp, bir şans verilip, denenebilir.
Хорошая игра про зомби, где вы можете поиграть в кооперативе с друзьями. (Лень дальше делать, я это для значка делаю :D)
Still a favorite, all these years later, between this and l4d2 getting a new content update, I feel like I'm in middle school again playing on the 360 with friends.

Прекрасная игра,где можно убить время и,  не сильно стараясь, пострелять в зомбаков. 
Недочетов хватает, но все же, играть можно.
Игра великолепная ,подойдёт как для тех кто хочет мощного шутана и кромсать зомби и для тех кто хочет просто прочувствовать атмосферу
es un buen juego a pesar del tiempo
Sure, Left 4 Dead 2 has all this game's content and more, but still a lot of fun!
Игра, на которую нельзя писать плохие обзоры

Still a good game! Just dont expect it to be as populated or content filled as L4D2. 

L4D2 has all the content 1 has but 1 is still worth playing through at least once in every campaign and some survival to see the differences.
CHICOS SE LOS RECOMIENDO QUE JUEGEN ES UN BUEN JUEGO PARA QUE LO DOMINEN BIEN Y ADEMAS ME ENCANTO SU JUGABILIDAD
Muito bom esse jogo nunca vi um igual
Un clásico de los que nunca mueren. Divertido para jugar en grupo, pero también para jugar solo. Si matar zombis es lo tuyo, no lo dudes.
Si alguna vez fue nominado a "juego del año", sera por algo no crees?
defenitly  playthis if you love first person zombie shooters;)

打包购买2+1，可惜我不打算来一句我是傻逼。
虽然2代包含1代的内容，还有了全面的提升，但是正因为如此，体验难免发生一点儿变化。比如近战武器的加入之类。在我看来，想要体验原汁原味的1代，还是直接购买一代比较好。更不用说这1代还稍微有一点儿情怀在里面（虽然当年玩的盗版）。
不过我还是要吐槽一句，这游戏一挂加速器，我靠，直接连到私服，各种乱七八糟的内容加收费项目，真的是有毒。

I love this game, this is the GREATEST ZOMBIE FPS co-op ever, but DO NOT BUY IT. GO STRAIGHT TO Left 4 DEAD 2. Do not waste any time or money on L4D1. My reasons below:

1. L4D1 servers are almost always empty at any given hour. There are no players there. The entire playing community has moved over to L4D2, where there are ALWAYS people to play with/against at any given hour. This is because...

2. ...all the L4D1 characters, maps and missions HAVE BEEN PORTED TO L4D2. You won't miss any story continuity by starting with L4D2 because L4D2 is essentially L4D1+2. The entire L4D1 experience is in L4D2. L4D1 has been left for dead. There's nothing there anymore.

3. Maps, missions and certain game modes that were intended for L4D1 but were never released have finally been implemented in L4D2.

The entire franchise is an effing 12+ years old, but just like Counterstrike, it is an immortal classic and has INFINITE replay value and fun factor. Just please PLEASE give this comment a thumbs up so everyone else thinking about buying L4D1 will be saved the trouble.
shoot the gross zombies or be the zombies and eat the fleshies

So... L4D2 has everything in this game +more. Why would i want to download this? Let me tell you why.
Because i wanted to see my own legs
Because Left 4 Dead 1 is way scarier
Because the new infected are so annoying
Because i like some of the glitches
Because i can easily make a game with cheats and play with cheats with a friend
Because the hud is way better
Because i love left 4 dead
Because ragdolls are so funny

12 years later, it still looks better than the sequel, the gunplay is better. 
It has 4k 2160p support and HDR as well. 
Is there any other company like Valve, returning to a 12 year old game to update it?

The near-immediate release of its sequel makes the original Left 4 Dead an odd beast to come back to. Valve's original zombie shooter is undoubtedly a classic in its own right, though all of its content is also packaged in its sequel. That said, I'd be lying if I said you can go wrong with a game like this.
Best cooperative experience I had on shooting games and zombie themed games.
It's an objectively good game and very fun. In the face of L4D2's L4D1 content(maps and mutations), this game is a little redundant but still worth playing.
es un buen juego tiene varias modabilidades puedes jugar con amigos y si buscas un reto juega solo y en dificultadad avanzado recomendado 1370000000/10
Left 4 Dead isn't it! Classic game that I loved playing many years ago, and it still holds up now. Love that it still works online. :) Great game, recommended to anyone who doesn't already have it.
jogo leve pra crl e muito bom
Melhor jogo de zumbi já feito !
Jogo foda, zerei até o final com os amigos.

И как всегда Valve нас поразила и сделала то, чего никто другой сделать не мог и пожалуй не может до сих пор. Они сделали L4D, кооперативный зомби-хоррор шутер с потрясающей реиграбельностью. Сколько же ночей было проведено в ней вместе с друзьями, сколько эмоций от каждой игры! Лично я могу назвать эту игру революцией среди игр про зомби и т.п. Сколько лет прошло с момента выхода, а в нее все так же приятно возвращаться, и она не кажется устаревшей, в ней приятная графика, отличный ии зомбарей, месиво и адреналин. Короче если вдруг кто-то не с нашей галактики и еще не играли в нее, то срочно устанавливайте, собирайте друзей, чтоб было веселее и вперед хуячить зомбарей!
Left4 dead başka bir şey diyemem
The game play does not get boring, the game is always challenging and there's enough guns to give you the ability to change your play style.  I would highly recommend picking up this game.
Simplismente incrivel, Pra mim o melhor coop zombies que foi feito ate hoje sem duvidas
单机、射击、闯关，集我最喜欢的游戏风格于一身，怎么会不喜欢。

While Left 4 Dead 2 is more feature rich, with all of the core content and more. Left 4 Dead 1 has more of a pure atmosphere and presentation that is all in the nuances. If you're a fan of subtly this one is still worth picking up.

全程感觉就是 压抑 阴暗 脏乱 恶臭 暗无天日    不要购买！！！！
The whole experience is depressing, dark, dirty, smelly and dark.     Don't buy! ！ ！ ！
